name: TendaSmart
0:
”Alexa, show me the Doorway”
”Alexa, show me the babyroom”
”Alexa, show me the bedroom”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Tenda cameras are designed to help you look after your home and family in a more convenient and smarter way – even when you’re away.With the Tenda Smart Skill and Alexa, you can now access your Tenda Camera via voice control by simply saying "Alexa,show me the Doorway."

Before you get started, please make sure your Tenda device is online and updated to the latest firmware. To get started, select the ‘Enable Skill’ button to link your Tenda account and discover your Tenda cameras. 

After linking your TDSEE account and discovering your Tenda cameras in your Alexa account, you can start controlling your cameras. 

To look the camera of the Doorway, you can say: 
“Alexa, show me the Doorway.” 

Compatible Tenda Cameras: 
CP3. More models will be supported.

Compatible TDSEE App:
The TDSEE app version should be 1.1.5 or higher.

Compatible Amazon Alexa Devices: 
-Echo Show 

Supported languages: English/French/German/Italian/Portugues/Spanish/Arabic

How to connect Tenda camera with Amazon Alexa:
https://www.tenda.com.cn

*When using this Skill, you need to specify the name of the desired camera. The name is equivalent to the location of where the camera was installed and can be found and configured in the TDSEE app. You can also add Tenda cameras to new or existing groups in the Alexa app.
